A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After only one viewing it's hard to give a just review. But overall\, I enjoyed it much more than VII\, and many things that I didn't like about VII were made better by this movie. Rian Johnson is a visionary\, and I give him credit for martyring himself to create this beautiful film. OT Fanboys will probably hate it. PT Fanboys will enjoy the few reference bones they are thrown. True fans will love the evolution of the series.
